document_data.mainbody: '''Dungeon magazine 88''' was the 88th issue of [[Dungeon magazine|''Dungeon'' magazine]]. It was released in September/October 2001.  It contained the following articles related to the [[Forgotten Realms]]:

The Door From Everywhere.Summary: This is an adventure set in various locales around the realms in [[1372 DR]], using 3rd edition rules.
The Door From Everywhere.Locations:
:;Buildings & Sites: [[Blister]]
:;Settlements: [[Saerloon]]
:;Wilderness: [[Dragonmere]] • [[High Forest]] • [[Stonelands]] • [[Storm Horns]] • [[Thunder Peaks]]
:;Realms: [[Anauroch]] • [[Cormyr]] • [[Sembia]] 
::{{Refonly}}
:[[Aencar's Manor]] • [[Citadel of the Raven]] • [[Earlann]] • [[Haunted Halls of Eveningstar]] • [[Monksblade]] • [[Myth Drannor]] • [[Netheril]] • [[Old Skull Inn]] • [[Scimitar Spires]] • [[Vast Swamp]] • [[Way of the Manticore]]
The Door From Everywhere.Organizations:
:;Families: [[Hawklin]]
:;Groups: [[Cult of the Dragon]] • [[Purple Dragon knights]] • [[War Wizards]] • [[Zhentilar]]

Thirds of Purloined Vellum.Summary: This is an adventure set in the [[Athkatla]], using 3rd edition rules.
Thirds of Purloined Vellum.Locations:
:;Buildings & Sites: [[Adamantine Mug Tavern]] • [[Arrasti Manor]] • [[Arrasti Perfumes]] • [[Arrasti Cosmetics]] • [[The Atrium]] • [[Avenue of Chimes]] • [[Jazasari Arrasti's Pavilion]] • [[Mantatlus' Manor]] • [[The Ophal Estate]] • [[Path of Silk Flowers]] • [[Platinum Quill]] • [[Silent Siren]] • [[The Waft]] • [[The Walk of Winds]]
:;Settlements: [[Athkatla]]
:;Realms: [[Amn]]
Thirds of Purloined Vellum.External links:
* [http://paizo.com/products/btpy7xh3?Dungeon-Issue-88 Dungeon magazine 88 at Paizo]
